DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether case management for type 2 diabetic patients with target-organ damage improves quality of care compared to usual care.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of a High-risk Diabetic Patients Program
DOC.criteria: Patients with diabetes mellitus Age between 18 and 80 years old Target organ damage (either macrovascular or microvascular) Patient's acceptance to participate Moderate to severe dementia Life expectancy lower than one year Justified negative from primary care physician to intervene the patient.
